ul.li: aonta masc agreement, assent, consent → eas-aonta fem. disagreement, dissent, discord(ance), disunity
eas-aontach adj. dissenting, dissident, discordant, disagreeable
eas-aontachd fem. disagreement, dissent, discord, disunity
aontaich vb. agree, consent → eas-aontaich vb. disagree, dissent
caraid masc. friend, relative → eas(-)caraid masc. enemy, foe
onair fem. honour → eas-onair fem. dishonour
onarach adj. honest, honourable → eas-ona(i)r(e)ach adj. dishonest, dishonourable
umhail adj. obedient, humble → eas-umhail adj. disobedient, insubordinate
ùmhlachd fem. obedience, humility → eas-ùmhlachd fem. disobedience, insubordination
urram masc. honour, respect → eas-urram masc. dishonour, disrespect
urramach adj. honourable, respectful → eas-urramach adj. dishonourable, disrespectful
